scenes.action_text: THE DARK KNIGHT RISES Written by Jonathan Nolan & Christopher Nolan Story by Christopher Nolan & David S. Goyer BLACK SCREEN. GORDON (V.O) Harvey Dent was needed. He was everything Gotham has been crying out for. He was...a hero. Not the hero we deserved - the hero we needed. Nothing less than a knight, shining... The sound of cracking. Splintering. A shape appears, in ice. The shape of a BAT. The ice disintegrates.
